import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheck, faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import Menu from './Menu' import { RestaurantApi } from '../auth/restaurant.api' import { RestaurantDto } from '../auth/dto/restaurant.dto' const Card: React.FunctionComponent = () => { return (
{status}
{error &&
{error}
}
{status === 'loading' ? ( Loading... ) : status === 'error' ? ( Error: {error?.message} ) : (

Places

{data?.map((restaurant) => (

{restaurant.name}

{restaurant.phone}
{restaurant.distance}
))}
)}
) } export default Card
